description: Shop staff reported being threatened by a man who demanded cash before riding off on a bicycle.
title: Man arrested over 'robbery with machete'
title_page: Man arrested over 'robbery with machete' in Scunthorpe - BBC News
maintext:
A man has been arrested after shop staff reported being threatened with a machete during an armed robbery.
Officers were called to a store in Manor Road, Scunthorpe, at about 19:50 GMT on Tuesday.
The man reportedly demanded cash from the till before riding away on a bicycle.
Humberside Police said a 24-year-old man had been arrested on suspicion of robbery on Thursday. He was also being questioned in connection with an alleged robbery in Priory Lane that day.
